trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Oregon City
There were no other sightings in Oregon City on or around November 13th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsLow in the sky, lights similar to standard aircraft from a distance, but as I approached closer on I-205 @ 65 miles per hour, I realized it was too big to be a plane or helicopter. I was Northbound and the object was low, and to the East. It may have been circular, but what I saw was a half-circle of lights and the object was tipped at an angle. Was moving but slowly heading south. I was stunned. Tried to see if other cars were slowing down to look, but my group was travelling too fast to be breaking. I didn't see any tail lights ahead of me, but the freeway was pretty crowded. Someone else had to have seen it.
Summary: Half circle of white string of lights with one blue, one red.
